sentences.sentence: Another unelected friend of Mr Zardari runs the interior ministry.
sentences.translation: 另一个未经选举的、扎尔·达里的朋友管理着内政部。

sentences.sentence: Even so, support for this crew of unelected spoilers has been rising.
sentences.translation: 尽管如此，这群未经选举的破坏者的支持率仍在上升。

sentences.sentence: And so the powers of this unelected and unaccountable position would grow.
sentences.translation: 因此，这个职位具有的未经选择，未加斟酌权力势必将增长。
